description:
Developed in collaboration with Tommy Caldwell, this light, skinny rope can handle the rigours of big-wall free climbing and tough redpoints. The sheath is braided on a machine with 48 bobbins, making it supple, with great hand-feel and abrasion-resistance. UIAA certified EcoDry treatment absorbs less than 2% of it's weight in water, so it stays light and is less susceptible to freezing in wet, cold conditions.

  • ColorTec sheath pattern change provides a permanent middle mark
  • Thermo Shield treatment gives it excellent handling properties, a supple feel and an impressive strength rating
  • EcoDry finish makes this rope durably water-repellent and dirt-resistant without the use of PFCs
  • 3D lap coiled so you can use it straight away without kinking or tangling
  • Meets UIAA standard water-repellent test, meaning this rope is fast-drying, absorbs virtually no water and resists freezing
name: Edelrid Tommy Caldwell Eco ColorTec 9.3mm Dry Rope
